text: Michael O'Loughlin (born 14 February 1997 in Carrick-on-Suir) is an Irish cyclist, who currently rides for French amateur team UC Nantes Atlantique. ==Major results== ;2014 : National Junior Road Championships ::2nd Road race ::2nd Time trial : 8th Time trial, UCI Junior Road World Championships ;2015 : 1st 20px Road race, National Junior Road Championships ;2016 : National Road Championships ::1st 20px Under-23 road race ::3rd Under-23 time trial ::3rd Road race ::4th Time trial ;2017 : National Road Championships ::1st 20px Under-23 road race ::1st 20px Under-23 time trial ::4th Time trial : 8th Overall An Post Rás ::1st 20px Young rider classification ;2018 : National Road Championships ::1st 20px Under-23 time trial ::3rd Under-23 road race ::4th Road race ;2019 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Under-23 Road Championships : 6th Time trial, European Games ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Irish male cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 2019 European Games Category:European Games competitors for Ireland
title: Michael O'Loughlin (cyclist)
